text: Nicolás Mejía (; born 11 February 2000) is a Colombian tennis player. Mejía has a career high ATP singles ranking of 1416 achieved on 7 May 2018. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 769 achieved on 13 August 2018. Mejía represents Colombia at the Davis Cup, where he has a W/L record of 0–1. ==ITF Futures Finals (1–2)== ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable" |- |width=200|Legend |- style="background:#cffcff;" |
